data: There is no place where men learn each other’s little peculiarities more thoroughly than in the group usually to be found around the stove in a country store.
THERE is no place where men learn each other's little peculiarities more thoroughly than in the group usually to be found around the stove in a country store.

Asa Holmes; or, At the Cross-Roads
Johnston, Annie F. (Annie Fellows), 1863-1931; Fosbery, E., 1874-1960 [Illustrator]
